articles.title: He spent 39 years behind bars for two murders he didn't commit. Gov. Jerry Brown just pardoned him
articles.description: Gov. Jerry Brown on Wednesday pardoned a 70-year-old man who spent nearly four decades in custody for two murders that police and prosecutors now say he didn't commit.
